items.from: What time does the meeting start?
It starts at eleven o'clock.
I am working from home today.
I usually get up at eight.
items.to: Normalmente me levanto a las ocho.

items.from: Can you send me the document today?
I will send it in a few minutes.
I have to make a phone call.
Sorry, I am busy right now.
Let's talk later.
Could you help me with this?
I need to practice Spanish every day.
items.to: Necesito practicar español todos los días.

items.from: I am trying to learn new words.
I would like to pay by card.
How much does it cost?
It is too expensive for me.
I am looking for a quiet place.
I like walking near the lake.
items.to: Me gusta caminar cerca del lago.

items.from: Today the weather is better than yesterday.
items.to: Hoy hace mejor tiempo que ayer.

items.from: I will be there in ten minutes.
If you want, we can meet on Thursday.
items.to: Si quieres, podemos quedar el jueves.
